video.title: White Collar
video.synopsis: To avoid jail, an ultra-suave con man signs on to help an FBI agent catch other white-collar thieves but he conceals an ulterior motive.

episodes.synopsis: When the trail of an elusive criminal stops cold, FBI agent Peter Burke teams up with an unlikely partner to catch him: the imprisoned Neal Caffrey.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: It's Fashion Week, and everyone in New York is abuzz with excitement -- everyone but Peter Burke.
episodes.title: Threads

episodes.synopsis: The disappearance of a precious bible creates an interesting union when a Mafia boss enlists the help of Peter and the FBI in finding the artifact.
episodes.title: Book of Hours

episodes.synopsis: A cache of gold sends Peter and Neal on a search to track down smuggled Iraqi artifacts.
episodes.title: Flip of the Coin

episodes.synopsis: When an expensive portrait is stolen from a young woman, Peter and Neal set a sting for the cunning and deadly culprit.
episodes.title: The Portrait

episodes.synopsis: Thrust into the underbelly of New York's Chinatown, Peter and Neal must navigate vicious Triads and Interpol agents to capture their target.
episodes.title: All In

episodes.synopsis: The FBI investigates a spectacular jewelry heist, and all the clues point to Neal. Now Peter must figure out the truth.
episodes.title: Free Fall

episodes.synopsis: Neal must infiltrate a company of corrupt Wall Street brokers. When Peter is forced to go undercover with him, their partnership may change forever.
episodes.title: Hard Sell

episodes.synopsis: When Peter and Neal discover that an estate judge committing mortgage fraud is also connected to Fowler, they devise a plan to bring them both down.
episodes.title: Bad Judgement

episodes.synopsis: When June's niece suffers renal trauma, Neal stumbles upon a cruel scheme to harvest human organs and brings the case to Peter.
episodes.title: Vital Signs

episodes.synopsis: Peter and Neal find themselves on the trail of an elusive femme fatale who is stealing pieces of a valuable collection.
episodes.title: Home Invasion

episodes.synopsis: An old rival of Neal's lays down a challenge: to see if either of them can create the impossible forgery -- fabricating a unique bottle of wine.
episodes.title: Bottlenecked

episodes.synopsis: When the daughter of a man from his past goes missing, Neal volunteers to help find her.
episodes.title: Front Man

episodes.synopsis: Neal teams up with Alex in order to retrieve the ever-elusive music box at an Italian consulate.
episodes.title: Out of the Box

episodes.synopsis: An elusive master thief has targeted a handful of New York's most prestigious banks, and it's up to Peter and Neal to thwart his next heist.
episodes.title: Withdrawal

episodes.synopsis: Neal goes undercover as a political "fixer" to bring a corrupt senator to justice.
episodes.title: Need to Know

episodes.synopsis: A talented criminal has copycatted a Neal Caffrey crime, and evidence points to a suspect on a college campus.
episodes.title: Copycat Caffrey

episodes.synopsis: Mozzie fears that the object of his affection has been kidnapped, and turns to Neal and Peter for help.
episodes.title: By the Book

episodes.synopsis: Neal and Peter work with insurance investigator Sarah Ellis to retrieve some stolen bonds, when they uncover a plot to kill her.
episodes.title: Unfinished Business

episodes.synopsis: Peter and Neal tackle an extortion case against adoptive parents, while they pursue a lead concerning the jet explosion.
episodes.title: In the Red

episodes.synopsis: An FBI agent is accused of selling witness locations during criminal trials, and the U.S. Marshals ask Peter and Neal for help locating the suspect.
episodes.title: Prisoner's Dilemma

episodes.synopsis: Neal and Peter must go undercover into the world of corporate espionage after a tech company's head researcher is murdered.
episodes.title: Company Man

episodes.synopsis: When Peter and Neal find a vital clue, Neal orchestrates an elaborate con to bring himself face-to-face with Kate's murderer.
episodes.title: Point Blank

episodes.synopsis: When Peter is suspended by the FBI for a crime he didn't commit, he is forced to run a sting with Neal and the gang to catch Mozzie's shooter.
episodes.title: Burke's Seven

episodes.synopsis: With the mastermind behind Kate's death uncovered, Peter and Neal explore their pasts to gain answers.
episodes.title: Forging Bonds

episodes.synopsis: When the son of an American diplomat is detained in Burma for a crime he didn't commit, Peter and Neal delve into the world of jewelry smuggling.
episodes.title: What Happens in Burma

episodes.synopsis: When an old friend of June's late husband shows up at Neal's doorstep, Neal suspects he's looking for more than a trip down memory lane.
episodes.title: Countermeasures

episodes.synopsis: Neal's rival, Matthew, kidnaps Peter. Neal is forced to make a dangerous deal with Keller's former adversary in order to save his partner and friend.
episodes.title: Payback

episodes.synopsis: Peter and Neal must assume each others' identities to uncover a scheme that is causing blackouts in New York.
episodes.title: Power Play

episodes.synopsis: Neal confronts the mastermind behind Kate's death and learns the answer to one of history's greatest mysteries.
episodes.title: Under the Radar

episodes.synopsis: Despite successfully escaping after having robbed the Federal Reserve, a notorious thief returns to retrieve the stash he left behind.
episodes.title: On Guard

episodes.synopsis: When a forged will turns out to be a treasure map, Peter and Neal race to find the inheritance and save the kidnapped daughter of the beneficiary.
episodes.title: Where There's a Will

episodes.synopsis: When a journalist's life is threatened, Diana goes undercover as her assistant while Peter and Neal investigate the subject of the journalist's story.
episodes.title: Deadline

episodes.synopsis: When a mobster from Mozzie's childhood surfaces in Manhattan, Neal and Peter must help their friend rework a scam from his past to prevent a mob war.
episodes.title: Dentist of Detroit

episodes.synopsis: When a black widow arrives in New York, Neal and Peter must go undercover as wealthy bachelors to find her next target.
episodes.title: Veiled Threat

episodes.synopsis: When a teenage con artist goes on a wild crime spree in New York, Peter realizes he has a new Neal Caffrey on his hands.
episodes.title: Scott Free

episodes.synopsis: When a hacker drains a prominent New York bank, Neal assumes the crook's identity in order to spend the pilfered fortune and draw him out of hiding.
episodes.title: Taking Account

episodes.synopsis: When agent Jones's Naval Academy buddy goes missing, Peter and Neal delve into the dangerous world of international private security to find him.
episodes.title: As You Were

episodes.synopsis: When Neal and Peter discover a wanted fugitive is smuggling antiquities into the city, Neal goes undercover with an Egyptologist to capture him.
episodes.title: On the Fence

episodes.synopsis: When the FBI flags one of the paintings on the treasure manifest, Peter enlists Neal to pursue it.
episodes.title: Countdown

episodes.synopsis: When Keller kidnaps Elizabeth, Peter and Neal must work together to meet his ransom demand. Neal is forced to come clean about the hidden cache.
episodes.title: Checkmate

episodes.synopsis: When scholarship funds from a Manhattan prep school mysteriously disappear, Neal poses as a substitute teacher to help figure out where the money is.
episodes.title: Upper West Side Story

episodes.synopsis: When Elizabeth overhears a neighbor's suspicious conversation, her curiosity leads Peter and Neal to uncover a robbery plot against a posh hotel.
episodes.title: Neighborhood Watch

episodes.synopsis: Sparks fly when Peter assigns Neal to work the case of a missing Stradivarius alongside Neal's ex-girlfriend, Sara Ellis.
episodes.title: Pulling Strings

episodes.synopsis: When a wealthy Yankees fan recruits Neal to steal a prized piece of memorabilia inside Yankee Stadium, Neal is reminded of life as a high-end thief.
episodes.title: Stealing Home

episodes.synopsis: When agent Kramer returns to derail Neal's commutation, Neal races to right a wrong from his past. Peter, in turn, must choose a side.
episodes.title: Judgment Day

episodes.synopsis: On an exotic remote island, Peter must race to find Neal and Mozzie before a ruthless bounty hunter captures Neal and locks him away for good.
episodes.title: Wanted

episodes.synopsis: Having found Neal and Mozzie, Peter must devise a plan to return Neal to the U.S. and avoid being captured by a government-sanctioned bounty hunter.
episodes.title: Most Wanted

episodes.synopsis: Now back in New York, Peter's actions on the island get him demoted and transferred out of the White Collar division.
episodes.title: Diminishing Returns

episodes.synopsis: Suspecting fraud, Neal and Peter investigate a beautiful widow who stands to inherit a massive life insurance policy.
episodes.title: Parting Shots

episodes.synopsis: A female art thief makes Neal an offer in exchange for important information about his past. The catch? He must steal a valuable piece of art.
episodes.title: Honor Among Thieves

episodes.synopsis: Mozzie buys a storage unit that leads him, Neal and Peter on a dangerous treasure hunt, following clues left by a revolutionary spy ring.
episodes.title: Identity Crisis

episodes.synopsis: When a criminal Peter arrested hires a high-powered political fixer to sabotage the trial, Peter and Neal must take on this devious opponent.
episodes.title: Compromising Positions

episodes.synopsis: In an episode that features Alex Hunter's return, Peter and his team investigate a series of museum heists targeting rare ancient artifacts.
episodes.title: Ancient History

episodes.synopsis: Peter sends Neal undercover as a Wall Street stock trader. Neal discovers a white-collar boxing ring where traders fight for insider information.
episodes.title: Gloves Off

episodes.synopsis: Peter and Neal attend an FBI conference where someone is trying to steal highly valued defense technology.
episodes.title: Vested Interest

episodes.synopsis: Peter and Neal attempt to find the truth behind Neal's father's crime. In doing so, Neal must go undercover into the world of counterfeit whiskey.
episodes.title: Family Business

episodes.synopsis: Peter and Neal look into Sen. Pratt's ties to corrupt cops who framed Neal's father. Their investigation also leads them to a real estate developer.
episodes.title: Brass Tacks

episodes.synopsis: A forgery and money-laundering case has links to jazz and taxicabs.
episodes.title: Empire City

episodes.synopsis: Peter and Neal take different approaches to catch a criminal duo caught up in a whirlwind romance.
episodes.title: Shoot the Moon

episodes.synopsis: Peter and Neal investigate sculpture forgeries and also get closer to the truth about the evidence box.
episodes.title: The Original

episodes.synopsis: The guys are almost able to retrieve the evidence box from the Empire State Building, but their efforts are impeded by Sen. Pratt.
episodes.title: In the Wind

episodes.synopsis: With Peter facing trial for a murder he didn't commit, Neal strikes a desperate deal with Curtis Hagan to forge the evidence that will free him.
episodes.title: At What Price

episodes.synopsis: Neal investigates an online black market with a new handler, but his loyalties are tested when he discovers the trail might lead to Mozzie.
episodes.title: Out of the Frying Pan

episodes.synopsis: Hagan orders Neal to steal a chapter from a book housed in a museum, and the brazen heist proves to be deadly for at least one person involved.
episodes.title: One Last Stakeout

episodes.synopsis: Mozzie is broke and living with Neal but is still able to help when Neal goes undercover to catch a psychiatrist who is manipulating her patients.
episodes.title: Controlling Interest

episodes.synopsis: Neal goes undercover as a butler to expose a potential impostor who is claiming to be the long-lost son of a wealthy Manhattan businessman.
episodes.title: Master Plan

episodes.synopsis: Posing as a skating coach and a sports agent, Peter and Neal infiltrate a Russian gang, while Mozzie researches the book that Neal pilfered for Hagan.
episodes.title: Ice Breaker

episodes.synopsis: Peter's ex-girlfriend enlists his help in the FBI's pursuit of a dangerous hacker, and Neal and Rebecca find a vital clue in the mystery of the codex.
episodes.title: Quantico Closure

episodes.synopsis: Neal and Peter undertake an unprecedented asset recovery case for the Museum of Natural History: a stolen Tyrannosaurus rex skeleton and its egg.
episodes.title: Digging Deeper

episodes.synopsis: While Neal and Mozzie plot to steal a stained-glass window, Peter investigates a complicated case of larceny, bribery and corruption.
episodes.title: No Good Deed

episodes.synopsis: Tensions increase as Hagan holds Rebecca hostage and tasks Neal with one last dangerous assignment, while Peter gets closer to finding a killer.
episodes.title: Live Feed

episodes.synopsis: Racing against the clock, Neal and Peter pursue the assassin who killed a fellow agent and has been orchestrating the efforts to compromise Neal.
episodes.title: Shot Through the Heart

episodes.synopsis: Peter recruits Diana for a corporate espionage case, and she goes undercover to prevent a rogue stock trader from initiating a financial meltdown.
episodes.title: Taking Stock

episodes.synopsis: Peter and Neal race to outwit a criminal mastermind who has poisoned Mozzie to force them to unearth an invaluable treasure hidden in New York.
episodes.title: Diamond Exchange

episodes.synopsis: Neil has an ulterior motive as he agrees to help Booth with a heist. Mozzie helps Peter and the FBI track the heist from the other side and nab Booth.
episodes.title: Borrowed Time

episodes.synopsis: Neal asks Peter to guarantee his freedom if Neal helps bring down the Panthers; Peter worries Neal's risky alliance with the Panthers may backfire.
episodes.title: Return to Sender

episodes.synopsis: Woodford orders Neal and his former partner, Keller, to run a con, putting Neal in an awkward position. Peter meets an Interpol agent.
episodes.title: Uncontrolled Variables

episodes.synopsis: Peter and Neal puzzle over the sudden silence from the Pink Panthers but find a new focus when someone from Mozzie's past returns to pull another con.
episodes.title: All's Fair

episodes.synopsis: Woodford suspects there's a mole in the group, so Neil and Peter go on the hunt. Peter and Woodford start to wonder if they can really trust Neil.
episodes.title: Whack-A-Mole

episodes.synopsis: While concocting his master plan, Neal solicits Peter's help in carrying out a dangerous heist that involves double-crossing the Pink Panthers.
episodes.title: Au Revoir
